entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to drizzle and showers near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers with drizzle in the evening and with flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
